content:
A new student parking lot was opened on the first day of school to students with a valid parking permit PERIOD Lot  is located north of the Fine Arts Building PERIOD

A new parking lot was opened up to students on the first day of class PERIOD

Lot  located on West Nedderman Drive has approximately  spaces available to students near the Nanofab Center PERIOD

Perry Eggleston Parking and Transportation director said the lot was opened to fill a need for student parking in that area PERIOD

The lot is for students and open for their use Eggleston said PERIOD

Biology junior Royce Nwankwo said considering the heat he would have liked for a new lot to be in a garage or closer PERIOD

The heat is unbearable Nwankwo said PERIOD By the time I walk anywhere Im already sweaty. nwankwo said he gets to campus at about  a.m PERIOD and doesnt even try to park close to his classes anymore PERIOD

He said even though he has a long period between classes he doesnt walk back to his car until he leaves in the afternoon and simply takes everything he will need for the day after he parks PERIOD

Industrial engineering sophomore Lupe Castillo said it didnt really matter where a new parking lot goes since all the lots are full by the time she gets to campus PERIOD

Castillo said she tries following students who are leaving the parking lots before resorting to parking in the back of lots PERIOD She said it sometimes takes longer for her to find a spot but she is closer to the campus PERIOD



CodyBonBon

cody.bahnmavs.uta.edu
